Game: Backyard Sports- Sandlot Sluggers An all-new arcade-style baseball game! Backyard Sports is back with Sandlot Sluggers, an all-new arcade-style baseball game that will keep you on your feet with non-stop fun and excitement. Backyard Sports: Sandlot Sluggers offers hours of entertainment with laugh out loud comedic commentary and exaggerated animations for a one-of-a-kind gaming experience.
